text: A Spectre Haunts Europe () is a 1923 Soviet silent movie directed by Vladimir Gardin.ПРИЗРАК БРОДИТ ПО ЕВРОПЕПризрак бродит по Европе (1922) It stars Zoya Barantsevich, Oleg Frelikh, and Yevgeny Gryaznov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Gardin Category:1923 movies
title: A Spectre Haunts Europe
